indexdef: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX appeals_case_id_appealing_party_key ON public.appeals USING btree (case_id, appealing_party)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX appeals_pkey ON public.appeals USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_appeals_appellant_id ON public.appeals USING btree (appellant_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_appeals_case_id ON public.appeals USING btree (case_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_appeals_status ON public.appeals USING btree (status)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX cases_code_key ON public.cases USING btree (code)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX cases_pkey ON public.cases USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_cases_code ON public.cases USING btree (code)
CREATE INDEX idx_cases_expires ON public.cases USING btree (expires_at) WHERE ((status)::text = 'pending_response'::text)
CREATE INDEX idx_cases_party_a ON public.cases USING btree (party_a_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_cases_party_b ON public.cases USING btree (party_b_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_cases_status ON public.cases USING btree (status)
CREATE INDEX idx_user_badges_user ON public.user_badges USING btree (user_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX user_badges_pkey ON public.user_badges USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX user_badges_user_id_badge_id_badge_tier_key ON public.user_badges USING btree (user_id, badge_id, badge_tier)
CREATE INDEX idx_user_case_history_created ON public.user_case_history USING btree (user_id, created_at DESC)
CREATE INDEX idx_user_case_history_user ON public.user_case_history USING btree (user_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX user_case_history_pkey ON public.user_case_history USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX user_case_history_user_id_case_id_key ON public.user_case_history USING btree (user_id, case_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_user_stats_user ON public.user_stats USING btree (user_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_user_stats_win_rate ON public.user_stats USING btree (win_rate DESC)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX user_stats_pkey ON public.user_stats USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX user_stats_user_id_key ON public.user_stats USING btree (user_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_usage_ip_date ON public.verdict_usage USING btree (guest_ip, used_at)
CREATE INDEX idx_usage_user_date ON public.verdict_usage USING btree (user_id, used_at)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX verdict_usage_pkey ON public.verdict_usage USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX verdicts_case_id_key ON public.verdicts USING btree (case_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX verdicts_pkey ON public.verdicts USING btree (id)
